blueprint.description: Installs KVM on systems that support it
blueprint.overview: Kernel-based Virtual Machine (or [KVM](https://www.linux-kvm.org/page/Main_Page)) is a virtualization module in the Linux kernel that allows the kernel to function as a hypervisor. It was merged into the Linux kernel mainline in kernel version 2.6.20, which was released on February 5, 2007.
blueprint.name: KVM
blueprint.title: KVM
